text:
眾所週知柳珉析的口頭禪：
第一是嗯…. ；第二是[redacted_name]哥；第三是金赫奎。
「怎麼沒用敬語？」 金赫奎輕輕的彈了一下柳珉析的額頭表示抗議。
「哥～讀書好累！ 休息一下好不好！ 拜託就一下下！」 小狗睜著他無辜的眼睛望著他哥。
「不行～」 「哥…拜託啦～」 「我要跟阿姨說囉！」
「好吧…」最終兩人的拉扯是在愛告狀的羊駝的威脅下告終。
trans:
As everyone knows, Liu Minxi’s catchphrases are:
First is "Um..."; second is "[redacted_name] Bro"; and third is "Kim Heokyu."
"Why didn’t you use honorifics?" Kim Heokyu lightly flicked Liu Minxi’s forehead in protest.
"Bro~ studying is so exhausting! Can’t I take a break? Please, just for a little while!" The puppy-eyed Liu Minxi looked innocently at his brother.
"No way~" "Bro… please~" "I’m going to tell Auntie!"
"Fine…" Their tussle finally ended with the threat from the tattletale alpaca.
